thoughts.text: I want to search for information on international law research resources, so I will use the 'google' command to perform a Google search.
thoughts.reasoning: By using the 'google' command to perform a search, I can find information on international law research resources that may be helpful for my work. This will allow me to expand my knowledge and find new resources that I may not have been aware of before.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'google' command to perform a search for 'international law research resources'.
- Review the search results and identify any relevant resources that may be helpful for my work.
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure that I am using reliable sources and that I am evaluating the information critically to ensure that it is accurate and relevant to my needs.
thoughts.speak: I want to search for information on international law research resources, so I will use the 'google' command to perform a Google search.
